sentences.sContent: ‘Catch me if you can,’ she said with a giggle.
sentences.sCn: “你来抓我呀。”她咯咯地笑着说。
薇姬忍住了她紧张的傻笑。

sentences.sContent: He looked so ridiculous I got the giggles (= started to giggle ) .
sentences.sCn: 他看上去太滑稽了，逗得我咯咯直笑。

sentences.sContent: Soon the whole group had the giggles .
sentences.sCn: 很快，组里所有的人都咯咯笑了起来。

sentences.sContent: Margaret was seized by a fit of the giggles (= she could not stop giggling ) .
sentences.sCn: 玛格丽特忍不住咯咯笑了起来。
